name: Minecraft Anvil PocketMine Data File
summary: An MCAPM file is a data file saved in the PMAnvil format, which is used by PocketMine-MP server software for Minecraft: Pocket Edition. It contains information about a Minecraft map, also known as a world or level. MCAPM files contain chunks, which are segments of a map that are referenced by the game and displayed as a player moves around the map.
